name: 6 Nights
description: A race to earn big money in this buying and selling property game. Outwit your opponents and make them stay for 6 nights. Charge them big rents and claim total domination.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7 or higher Processor: 500 Mhz or faster Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 128 MB available space Additional Notes: Practically runs on any windows machine with Keyboard and Mouse
